articles.author: William Brangham, Sam Weber
articles.title: Why scientists are concerned about the latest transmission of bird flu to cows - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: The outbreak of bird flu in the U.S. has alarmed researchers and prompted new efforts to track the virus that's already killed millions of birds from Europe to Antarctica. As H5N1 continues to jump into mammals, many scientists are concerned that we're not wa…
articles.content:
William Brangham:
In fact, unlike cows, this bird flu has been deadly to the nearly two dozen other mammal species that have been infected in this U.S., from a polar bear in Alaska, to a mountain li… [+821 chars]
